About me

Hi, my name is Dung Tao. I'm a software developer with 4+ years of professional experience, based in HCMC Vietnam. I develop modern, highly interactive, responsive websites & web apps with cutting-edge technologies. I love learning new things, making new friends, driving a car and playing tennis. Let's get to know each other, drop me a line: taomanhdung@gmail.com or via Skype: taomanhdungit
